      public MutualFund(String symbol, String name, int quantity, double price)
      Constructs a MutualFund object with the specified symbol, name, quantity, and price.
      Parameters:
      symbol - the symbol of the mutual fund
      name - the name of the mutual fund
      quantity - the quantity of units
      price - the price per unit

  • Method Details

    • buy

      public void buy(int additionalQuantity, double price)
      Buys additional units of the mutual fund. The book value is increased based on the quantity and price of the new purchase.
      Specified by:
      buy in class Investment
      Parameters:
      additionalQuantity - the quantity to buy
      price - the price per unit

    • sell

      public double sell(int quantityToSell, double price)
      Sells a specified quantity of units of the mutual fund. A redemption fee is subtracted from the proceeds of the sale.
      Specified by:
      sell in class Investment
      Parameters:
      quantityToSell - the quantity to sell
      price - the price per unit
      Returns:
      the proceeds from the sale after deducting the redemption fee
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the quantity to sell is greater than the available quantity
